property.name: name
property.description: The name of an entity (e.g., user, category, product, role).

property.name: key
property.description: A unique key used to identify an entity or a piece of data.

property.name: countryIso2Code
property.description: The two-letter ISO code for a country.

property.name: address1
property.description: The first line of a street address.

property.description: The second line of a street address.

property.name: address3
property.description: The third line of a street address.

property.description: The postal code for an address.

property.name: city

property.name: servicePoints
property.description: A collection of service points.

property.name: quote
property.description: A data object representing a shopping cart before it becomes an order.

property.description: A collection of selected service points.

property.name: uuid
property.description: A Universally Unique Identifier for an entity.

property.name: status
property.description: A HTTP status code.

property.description: A Spryker specific error code.

property.name: detail
